alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 09 at 2:28AM MST until November 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST TODAY THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon CST today through this afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Hutchinson and Bon Homme. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
